lead_paragraph: GERWIN--James D.,of Boulder, CO formerly of Chappaqua, NY died on February 22, 2016 at age 69. He is survived by his wife, Arlene; his twin sons Benjamin (Mani) and Philip (Cathy) and granddaughters Lauren and Eleanor. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GERWIN, JAMES D.

snippet: GERWIN--James D.,of Boulder, CO formerly of Chappaqua, NY died on February 22, 2016 at age 69. He is survived by his wife, Arlene; his twin sons Benjamin (Mani) and Philip (Cathy) and granddaughters Lauren and Eleanor. 1/3
